com.StoreX.service.AuthorizationServices

Interface AuthorizationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthorizationServiceImpl

    public interface AuthorizationService
    Service which is responsible for the logic of the authorization process of Users.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getUserType(java.lang.String userName) 
      boolean isUserAuthorized(java.util.UUID sessionID)
      Checks if the given sessionID is valid - if the user is correctly authorized.

      Logs users in.

      Used to register a new user.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        java.util.UUID login(UserBo user)
        Logs users in. If the user is logged in correctly a sessionID is returned.
        Returns:
        sessionId

      • register

        boolean register(UserBo newUser)
        Used to register a new user. This method validates that all needed data is filled.
        Parameters:
        newUser -
        Returns:
        true if the user was correctly registered

      • isUserAuthorized

        boolean isUserAuthorized(java.util.UUID sessionID)
        Checks if the given sessionID is valid - if the user is correctly authorized.
        Parameters:
        sessionID - the sessionID of the User
        Returns:
        true if the sessionId is valid

        java.lang.String getUserType(java.lang.String userName)
